answers.answer: They did stop after like 2 hours so I have no idea what it was.
Prob braxton.hicks. Mine have been consistent but not overly painful

Sounds like Braxton hicks I've been having them too even when I'm hooked up to fetal monitor because I have to do non stress tests for my diabetes and Dr tells me all is well and it's just my body preparing itself
Well that's good to know because I almost woke my fiance up in a panic. Do u ladies know of anything to alleviate that pain?
Have u tried Tylenol?  Or laying on ur side and drink lots of water it's suppose to help doesn't always but worth a try
OK I will try Tylenol next time with a tall glass of water thank you :)

question: Almost 37 weeks and last night I had very bad cramping almost like menstrual cramps but more painful and they woke me up out of a sound sleep are those possible contractions? Is it possible for contractions to happen with out losing ur mucus plug? I need help here FTM!!!
title: Possible Contractions?!
